# [Story in Trello](#)

## Done?

### Done for approval?

* [ ] Acceptance criteria are met
* [ ] Code quality checks are green
* [ ] Readme updated if needed
* [ ] Story under test
* [ ] Mobile works
* [ ] Seeds created
* [ ] Translated
* [ ] Code is reviewed

### Done after the merge?

* [ ] Deployed to staging after the merge
* [ ] Tested manually on staging
